TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed Collection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Collection Implements IDeserializationCallback, IList, ISerializable
public ref class Collection sealed : System::Collections::IList, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type Collection = class interface ICollection interface IList interface ISerializable interface IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: Visual Basic 是可作为单元引用的一组有序项。

span.span: A Visual Basic is an ordered set of items that can be referred to as a unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 只要可能，您应使用 命名空间或 命名空间而不是 Visual Basic `Collection` 中的泛型集合。Whenever possible, you should use the generic collections in the namespace or the namespace instead of a Visual Basic `Collection`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[集合](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e76533a9-5033-4a0b-b003-9c2be60d185b)。For more information, see [Collections](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e76533a9-5033-4a0b-b003-9c2be60d185b). Visual Basic`Collection`对象提供了简便的方法来指代为单个对象相关的项组。The Visual Basic `Collection` object provides a convenient way to refer to a related group of items as a single object. 该项目，或*元素*中只需要在集合中存在的这一事实相关集合。The items, or *elements*, in a collection need only be related by the fact that they exist in the collection. 集合中的元素不需要共享相同的数据类型。Elements of a collection do not have to share the same data type. 可以创建集合的相同方式创建其他对象，如以下示例所示。You can create a collection the same way you create other objects, as the following example illustrates. ```vb Dim coll As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection() ``` 创建集合后，可以执行以下任一操作：Once you have created a collection, you can do any of the following: - 添加具有的元素方法。Add an element with the method. - 删除具有的元素方法。Remove an element with the method. - 删除具有的所有元素方法。Remove all elements with the method. - 找出与集合中包含的元素数量属性。Find out how many elements the collection contains with the property. - 检查特定元素是否存在与方法。Check whether a specific element is present with the method. - 返回集合中具有特定元素属性。Return a specific element from the collection with the property. - 循环访问整个集合与[为每个...下一条语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)。Iterate through the entire collection with the [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md). > [!NOTE] > 尽管 Visual Basic`Collection`对象具有相同的功能`Collection`对象在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，这两个无法在 COM 环境中进行交互操作。Although the Visual Basic `Collection` object has functionality identical to the `Collection` object in Visual Basic 6.0, the two cannot interoperate in a COM environment. > [!CAUTION] > 循环访问 Visual Basic`Collection`不是线程安全过程。Iterating through a Visual Basic `Collection` is not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合同步的其他线程仍可以修改集合，从而使枚举器引发异常。Even if the collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, causing the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程线程安全性，请锁定集合或捕获由其他线程所做的更改导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, either lock the collection or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 有关锁定的编程元素的详细信息，请参阅[SyncLock 语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)。For more information on locking a programming element, see [SyncLock Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建`Collection`对象`names`和一个对话框，使用该用户可以向集合添加对象 （名称）。The following example creates the `Collection` object `names` and a dialog box with which a user can add objects (names) to the collection. 它然后在集合中，显示名称，并最后清空集合而不释放`Collection`对象本身。It then displays the names in the collection, and finally empties the collection without disposing of the `Collection` object itself. 若要查看这的工作原理，请选择**添加类**命令**项目**菜单，并声明名为的公共变量`instanceName`在模块级别的`nameClass`(类型`Public instanceName`) 来保存每个实例的名称。To see how this works, choose the **Add Class** command from the **Project** menu and declare a public variable called `instanceName` at the module level of `nameClass` (type `Public instanceName`) to hold the names of each instance. 保留默认名称为`nameClass`。Leave the default name as `nameClass`. 复制并粘贴下面的代码插入**常规**部分中的另一个模块，然后启动它与语句`classNamer`在另一个过程。Copy and paste the following code into the **General** section of another module, and then start it with the statement `classNamer` in another procedure. （此示例仅适用于宿主应用程序支持类。）(This example works only with host applications that support classes.) [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建并返回一个新的 Visual Basic 对象。

span.span: Creates and returns a new Visual Basic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此构造函数的 Visual Basic 集合为空，且不具有任何已分配的初始容量。The Visual Basic collection returned by this constructor is empty and does not have any initial capacity allocated. Visual Basic 集合都不符合[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]集合中可用， ，和命名空间。Visual Basic collections are not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] collections available in the , , and namespaces. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个新的 Visual Basic 集合并将其分配给该变量`coll`:The following example creates a new Visual Basic collection and assigns it to the variable `coll`: ```vb Dim coll As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection() ``` 这`Collection`对象是从 1 开始，这意味着，从 1 到的值的元素范围的索引值`Count`属性。This `Collection` object is one-based, which means that the index values of the elements range from 1 through the value of the `Count` property. Visual Basic 集合才会保留类型的元素。Visual Basic collections hold elements of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (object Item, string Key = null, object Before = null, object After = null);
.method public instance void Add(object Item, string Key, object Before, object After) cil managed
Public Sub Add (Item As Object, Optional Key As String = null, Optional Before As Object = null, Optional After As Object = null)
member this.Add : obj * string * obj * obj -> unit

param.name: Item
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定要添加到集合的元素的任意类型的对象。

span.span: An object of any type that specifies the element to add to the collection.

param.name: Key
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定键字符串的唯一 表达式，可以用此键字符串代替定位索引访问集合的这个新元素。

span.span: A unique expression that specifies a key string that can be used instead of a positional index to access this new element in the collection.

param.name: Before
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定集合中的相对位置的表达式。

span.span: An expression that specifies a relative position in the collection.

param.span: 将要添加的元素放在集合中由 参数标识的元素前面。

span.span: The element to be added is placed in the collection before the element identified by the argument.

param.span: 如果 是数值表达式，则它必须是介于 1 和集合的 属性值之间的数值。

span.span: If is a numeric expression, it must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 如果 是 表达式，则必须对应于将引用的元素添加到集合时指定的键字符串。

span.span: If is a expression, it must correspond to the key string specified when the element being referred to was added to the collection.

param.span: 不能同时指定 和 。

span.span: You cannot specify both and .

param.name: After
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定集合中的相对位置的表达式。

span.span: An expression that specifies a relative position in the collection.

param.span: 将要添加的元素放在集合中由 参数标识的元素后面。

span.span: The element to be added is placed in the collection after the element identified by the argument.

param.span: 如果 是数值表达式，则它必须是介于 1 和集合的 属性值之间的数值。

span.span: If is a numeric expression, it must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 如果 是 表达式，则必须对应于将引用的元素添加到集合时指定的键字符串。

span.span: If is a expression, it must correspond to the key string specified when the element referred to was added to the collection.

param.span: 不能同时指定 和 。

span.span: You cannot specify both and .

summary.span: 将一个元素添加到 对象。

span.span: Adds an element to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Before`或`After`自变量必须引用现有元素的集合; 否则，就会出错。The `Before` or `After` argument must refer to an existing element of the collection; otherwise, an error occurs. 如果这两个`Before`和`After`省略自变量，新对象添加到集合的末尾。If both the `Before` and `After` arguments are omitted, the new object is added to the end of the collection. 如果指定，也会发生错误`Key`值与现有集合的元素的键匹配。An error also occurs if a specified `Key` value matches the key for an existing element of the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Add`方法中添加`child`对象的类的实例调用`child`包含`Public`属性`name`– 针对一个名为集合`family`。The following example uses the `Add` method to add `child` objects - instances of a class called `child` containing a `Public` property `name` - to a collection called `family`. 若要阐释其工作方式，创建具有两个控件并设置其属性设置为`Add`和`List`。To see how this works, create a with two controls and set their properties to `Add` and `List`. 添加`child`类定义和`family`声明对窗体代码。Add the `child` class definition and the `family` declaration to the form code. 修改`_Click`事件处理程序**添加**并**列表**按钮所示。Modify the `_Click` event handlers for the **Add** and **List** buttons as shown. **添加**按钮可以添加子级。The **Add** button allows you to add children. **列表**按钮显示的所有子级的名称。The **List** button displays the names of all the children. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 删除 Visual Basic 对象的所有元素。

span.span: Deletes all elements of a Visual Basic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Clear`方法可清空集合并将重置其属性设为 0。The `Clear` method empties the collection and resets its property to 0. ## Examples [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool Contains(string Key) cil managed
Public Function Contains (Key As String) As Boolean

param.name: Key
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 表达式，指定搜索集合的元素所用的键。

span.span: A expression that specifies the key for which to search the elements of the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示 Visual Basic 对象是否包含一个带有特定键的元素。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a Visual Basic object contains an element with a specific key.

returns.span: 如果 Visual Basic 对象包含一个带有特定键的元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Visual Basic object contains an element with a specific key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Contains` 返回`True`如果集合包含的元素的键恰好与`Key`。`Contains` returns `True` if the collection contains an element with a key exactly matching `Key`. 否则，`Contains` 将返回 `False`。Otherwise, `Contains` returns `False`. 密钥值进行匹配时忽略大小写。Case is ignored when matching key values. Visual Basic`Collection`可以保存具有密钥的某些元素和其他元素没有键。A Visual Basic `Collection` can hold some elements that have keys and other elements without keys. 这取决于是否在调用方法提供可选的参数`Key`参数。This depends on whether the call to the method supplies an argument to the optional `Key` parameter. ## Examples [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 如果您想要使用其键的元素在集合中搜索，请记得提供`Key`自变量每次调用`Add`方法。If you intend to search the collection for elements using their keys, remember to supply the `Key` argument every time you call the `Add` method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的元素数。

span.span: Gets the number of elements in a collection.
The number of elements in a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Count`属性来确定中的元素数`Collection`对象。Use the `Count` property to determine the number of elements in a `Collection` object. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Count`属性来显示中的元素数变量中的对象`birthdays`。This example illustrates the use of the `Count` property to display the number of elements in a object in the variable `birthdays`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#6)] `Collection`对象是从 1 开始，这意味着，从 1 到的值的元素范围的索引值`Count`属性。The `Collection` object is one-based, which means that the index values of the elements range from 1 through the value of the `Count` property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 用于循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [为每个...下一条语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)调用`GetEnumerator`若要获取用于支持循环访问集合的元素的枚举器对象。The [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md) calls `GetEnumerator` to obtain an enumerator object to support iteration over a collection's elements. 通常情况下，使用`For Each`...`Next`循环来遍历集合或数组，并且不需要调用`GetEnumerator`显式。Normally, you use a `For Each`...`Next` loop to traverse a collection or array, and you do not need to call `GetEnumerator` explicitly. 如果您需要仔细控制对迭代进行比`For Each`...`Next`语句提供，可以使用`GetEnumerator`方法来执行自定义的遍历。If you need closer control over the iteration than the `For Each`...`Next` statements provide, you can use the `GetEnumerator` method to perform a customized traversal. 以下是某些情况下您可能需要执行此操作。The following are some cases in which you might need to do this. - 您可能想要返回到集合的开头并重新开始迭代之前完成。You might want to return to the beginning of the collection and start the iteration again before it is finished. - 您可能想要跳过一个或多个元素的原因有多种。You might want to skip over one or more elements for a variety of reasons. - 您可能需要更改中间遍历集合的元素。You might need to change the elements of the collection in the middle of a traversal. 在这种情况下必须获取新枚举数对象，因为前一个会失效。In this case you must obtain a new enumerator object because the previous one is invalidated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`GetEnumerator`若要检索的所有元素`Collection`对象。The following example shows how to use `GetEnumerator` to retrieve all the elements of a `Collection` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#7)] `GetEnumerator` 构造并返回一个枚举器对象，它实现接口的命名空间。`GetEnumerator` constructs and returns an enumerator object, which implements the interface of the namespace. 枚举器对象公开属性和和方法。The enumerator object exposes the property and the and methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[为每个...下一条语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)。For more information, see [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md).

summary.span: 按位置或键获取 对象的特定元素。

span.span: Gets a specific element of a object either by position or by key.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(Index As Integer) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[int] { System::Object ^ get(int Index); };

param.name: Index
param.span: 一个数值表达式，用于指定集合的元素位置。

span.span: A numeric expression that specifies the position of an element of the collection.

param.span: 必须为介于 1 到集合的 属性的值之间的数字。

span.span: must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 或 (B) 指定集合中元素的位置或键字符串的 表达式。

span.span: Or (B) An expression that specifies the position or key string of an element of the collection.

summary.span: 按位置或键获取 对象的特定元素。

span.span: Gets a specific element of a object either by position or by key.

value.span: 特定元素按位置或键的对象。

span.span: A specific element of a object either by position or by key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`属于类型`Object`，则`Item`属性尝试将其视为`String`， `Char`，`Char`数组或整数值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`不能转换`Index`到`String`或`Integer`，则会引发异常。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`属性是集合的默认属性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，以下代码行是等效的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ```vb MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Item`属性来检索集合中对象的引用。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它会创建`birthdays`作为`Collection`对象，然后检索对象，表示 Bill 的生日，使用密钥`"Bill"`作为`Index`参数。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 请注意，第一次调用显式指定`Item`属性，但第二个却没有。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 这两个调用起作用，因为`Item`属性是默认属性`Collection`对象。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`属于类型`Object`，则`Item`属性尝试将其视为`String`， `Char`，`Char`数组或整数值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`不能转换`Index`到`String`或`Integer`，则会引发异常。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`属性是集合的默认属性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，以下代码行是等效的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ```vb MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Item`属性来检索集合中对象的引用。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它会创建`birthdays`作为`Collection`对象，然后检索对象，表示 Bill 的生日，使用密钥`"Bill"`作为`Index`参数。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 请注意，第一次调用显式指定`Item`属性，但第二个却没有。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 这两个调用起作用，因为`Item`属性是默认属性`Collection`对象。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

span.span: A specific element of a object either by position or by key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`属于类型`Object`，则`Item`属性尝试将其视为`String`， `Char`，`Char`数组或整数值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`不能转换`Index`到`String`或`Integer`，则会引发异常。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`属性是集合的默认属性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，以下代码行是等效的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ```vb MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Item`属性来检索集合中对象的引用。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它会创建`birthdays`作为`Collection`对象，然后检索对象，表示 Bill 的生日，使用密钥`"Bill"`作为`Index`参数。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 请注意，第一次调用显式指定`Item`属性，但第二个却没有。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 这两个调用起作用，因为`Item`属性是默认属性`Collection`对象。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

summary.span: 从 对象移除元素。

span.span: Removes an element from a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(int32 Index) cil managed

param.name: Index
param.span: 一个数值表达式，用于指定集合的元素位置。

span.span: A numeric expression that specifies the position of an element of the collection.

param.span: 必须为介于 1 到集合的 属性的值之间的数字。

span.span: must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

summary.span: 从 对象移除元素。

span.span: Removes an element from a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时`Remove`删除的元素从一个集合，它递减集合的通过其中一个属性。When `Remove` deletes an element from a collection, it decrements the collection's property by one. 它还递减`Index`先前跟在集合中删除的元素之后的每个元素的值。It also decrements the `Index` value of every element that formerly followed the deleted element in the collection. 如果元素已添加到没有集合`Key`，则必须使用其`Index`以将其删除。If an element was added to the collection without a `Key`, you must use its `Index` to remove it. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Remove`方法中删除对象从变量中的对象`birthdays`。This example illustrates the use of the `Remove` method to remove objects from a object in the variable `birthdays`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 以下四个调用`Add`方法，`Count`属性包含 4，元素`"Bill"`具有索引值为 1 和元素`"Pete"`的索引值为 4。Following the four calls to the `Add` method, the `Count` property contains 4, element `"Bill"` has index value 1, and element `"Pete"` has index value 4. 第一个之后调用`Remove`，`Count`为 3，元素`"Bill"`删除时，元素和`"Pete"`的索引值为 3。Following the first call to `Remove`, `Count` is 3, element `"Bill"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 3. 第二个之后调用`Remove`，`Count`为 2，元素`"Mike"`删除时，元素和`"Pete"`的索引值为 2。Following the second call to `Remove`, `Count` is 2, element `"Mike"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(string Key) cil managed

param.name: Key
param.span: 指定键字符串的唯一 表达式，可以使用此键字符串代替位置索引访问集合中的元素。

span.span: A unique expression that specifies a key string that can be used, instead of a positional index, to access an element of the collection.

param.span: 必须对应于将元素添加到集合中时指定的 参数。

span.span: must correspond to the argument specified when the element was added to the collection.

summary.span: 从 对象移除元素。

span.span: Removes an element from a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时`Remove`删除的元素从一个集合，它递减集合的通过其中一个属性。When `Remove` deletes an element from a collection, it decrements the collection's property by one. 它还递减`Index`先前跟在集合中删除的元素之后的每个元素的值。It also decrements the `Index` value of every element that formerly followed the deleted element in the collection. 如果元素已添加到没有集合`Key`，则必须使用其`Index`以将其删除。If an element was added to the collection without a `Key`, you must use its `Index` to remove it. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Remove`方法中删除对象从变量中的对象`birthdays`。This example illustrates the use of the `Remove` method to remove objects from a object in the variable `birthdays`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 以下四个调用`Add`方法，`Count`属性包含 4，元素`"Bill"`具有索引值为 1 和元素`"Pete"`的索引值为 4。Following the four calls to the `Add` method, the `Count` property contains 4, element `"Bill"` has index value 1, and element `"Pete"` has index value 4. 第一个之后调用`Remove`，`Count`为 3，元素`"Bill"`删除时，元素和`"Pete"`的索引值为 3。Following the first call to `Remove`, `Count` is 3, element `"Bill"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 3. 第二个之后调用`Remove`，`Count`为 2，元素`"Mike"`删除时，元素和`"Pete"`的索引值为 2。Following the second call to `Remove`, `Count` is 2, element `"Mike"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .method newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator ICollectionGetEnumerator() cil managed
Function ICollectionGetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取能够循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也会枚举数放回此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到将返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returns `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method newslot virtual instance void IListInsert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub IListInsert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert
virtual void IListInsert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 应插入 的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入到 对象中的 。

span.span: The to insert into the object.

summary.span: 将项插入 对象中的指定索引处。

span.span: Inserts an item to the object at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等于的中的项数目对象，然后`value`追加到末尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the object, then `value` is appended to the end. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.

exception.span: 不是 对象中的有效索引。

span.span: is not a valid index in the object.
The object is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method newslot virtual instance void IListRemove(object value) cil managed
Sub IListRemove (value As Object) Implements IList.Remove

param.name: value
param.span: 要从 对象中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the object.

summary.span: 从 对象中移除特定对象的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 如果`value`中找不到对象，对象保持不变且不会引发异常。If `value` is not found in the object, the object remains unchanged and no exception is thrown.

span.span: The object is read-only.
-or-
The object has a fixed size.
